name: Misdemeanor
description:
A very short game, made in 4 hours for the Trijam #119.

The theme was "Law & Order".

Play as a cop, observe everyone around you and try to catch all the criminals.

Move with WASD, arrest someone with SPACE.

But careful: if you arrest someone you have to charge the defendant in front of a trial. So don't arrest someone if you're not 100% confident about what he or she did!

Enjoy, I guess...?

Made with Godot, a little bit of GIMP and Chiptone for the sound effects. Using the RPG Urban Pack sprites from kenney.nl and the Music track Grey Sector from FoxSynergy.
